nl.surfnet.oda

Class EntityHandler<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.surfnet.oda.EntityHandler<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the object. For example, Person

    public abstract class EntityHandler<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a generic class for all API methods which return an instance of an object.
    Author:
    Daniel Zolnai

    • Constructor Summary

      EntityHandler() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void failure(NetworkError e)
      If there was an error, call this with the exception
      abstract void success(T result)
      If the API call finished without an error, call this method with the result as a parameter.
